headline: Global Payments Announces the Launch of its Genius™ for Enterprise POS Solution
summary: ATLANTA, September 10, 2025--Global Payments today announced that its Genius solution for enterprise customers is available in the U.S.

headline: Global Payments Launches Genius™ in the UK
summary: LONDON, September 10, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN), a leading worldwide provider of payment technology and software solutions, today announced Genius is now available for quick service restaurant (QSR) and fast casual customers in the UK.
